title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008 - Super Patch FKUYT_v3
description:
NOTE: I TAKE NO CREDIT FOR THIS PATCH!!! I AM MEERLY SEEDING IT FOR OTHERS TO USE!

Description of the Patch:
- Leagues EPL, Ligue 1, Calcio, LFP, Eredivisie, Bundesliga 
- Bootpack Nike, Adidas, Umbro, Puma y Lotto asigned
- Kits 07/08 of all teams and countries
- Balls Nike, Adidas, Umbro
- More than 70 Faces adds and Hairs asigns 
- Leagues, teams, countries and cups in HD
- Replay Logos and Champions Ads
- Champions League Scoreboard
- More than 100 StadiumÃ‚Â´s Adboards
- Stadiums Previews
- World Map 
- Xbox 360 > Ps3 Controls
- Option File of Ingeniero24 with transfers, real names, formations, classic teams, 

THE SCREENSHOTS OF THE PATCH ARE IN THE &#039;SCREENSHOTS&#039; FOLDER IN THE RAR


INSTRUCTIONS

OK FIRST OF ALL YOU MAY WANT TO MAKE A FOLDER 
ON YOUR DESKOP TO BACK UP THE FILES  IN YOUR PES2008 OPTION FILES INCASE YOU BUGGER THIS UP, THE FILES YOU MAY WANT TO BACKUP ARE: 

CS.IMG, RV_E.IMG, CV_1.IMG AND CV_0.IMG AND MAYBE YOUR SETTINGS.EXE IN THE PES2008 PROGRAM FILES


1- Unzip download files

2- Open Afs Explorer 3.7 (also included in the rar), go to file import AFS file, where it says &#039;Files of Type&#039; select &#039;all files&#039;, then go to your pes 2008 program files, which is in konami/pro evolution soccer/img  and open cv_0.img

3- It will then ask you something, Put no in the first option, and then ok in the second

4- Go to Action/ Import Folder and find the folder cv_0 in the folder you downloaded

5- A window will appear telling that it must regenerate the file, you tell yes and save it in the desktop as "cv_0.img"

6- After that accept the options that appear, and you close Afs Explorer

7- Finally, copy/paste the file &#039;cv_0.img&#039; in Konami/Pro Evolution Soccer 2008/img, then click yes to overwrite (this is where if you go wrong you copy and paste the originals back into the pes2008 program files folder)

8- After that you do exactly the same steps for the files cv_1.img, rv_e.img and pdata.img, (but obviously where it says cv_0.img in the instructions imagine it is the file you are editing)

9- Copy/Paste the folder &#039;save&#039;, which is located in the &#039;Of&#039; folder into  My Documents/KONAMI/Pro Evolution Soccer 2008, but only do this after you have started the game once (otherwise the existing folder wont be there)


PLEASE NOTE : WITH THIS PATCH I HAVE EXPIERIENCED 1 PROBLEM, THAT IS THAT SOMETIMES WHEN YOU START PES 2008 
IT COMES UP WITH THE &#039;Pro Evolution Soccer 2008 has encountered a problem and needs to close.  
                      We are sorry for the inconvenience.&#039; 
                    
HOWEVER, IF YOU KEEP TRYING IT WILL WORK, IT TAKES AROUND 4 GOES, BUT I DID WARN YOU
IT IS UP TO YOU, PERSONALLY IT DOESNT BOTHER ME AS THE PATCH MAKES UP FOR THE ERROR.
